channel.title: MateusShirlaw on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in MateusShirlaw on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: The new order pages in PrestaShop 1.7.7
item.description: With the release of the new version 1.7.7, this article has the ambition to detail one of the major features of the version. Our work was focused on one of the most used pages by our merchants: the orders’ management page. We are thrilled to introduce to you the new features around the order process. But before jumping into the features awaiting the merchants in the new version, we would like to share our thinking process.
